title: Roman Nykytyuk
text:
Roman Nykytyuk (; born 9 September 1993 in <a href="Lutsk">Lutsk</a>, <a href="Volyn%20Oblast">Volyn Oblast</a>, <a href="Ukraine">Ukraine</a>) is a <a href="professional">professional</a> <a href="Ukraine">Ukrainian</a> <a href="football%20%28association%29">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a> who plays for <a href="FC%20Hirnyk-Sport%20Horishni%20Plavni">Hirnyk-Sport Horishni Plavni</a>.
Career.
Nykytyuk attended the Sportive youth school of FC Volyn Lutsk. He made his debut for <a href="FC%20Volyn%20Lutsk">FC Volyn Lutsk</a> played as substituted in the game against <a href="FC%20Zorya%20Luhansk">FC Zorya Luhansk</a> on 20 April 2014 in <a href="Ukrainian%20Premier%20League">Ukrainian Premier League</a>.
